Package ball

Class Ball

java.lang.Object
ball.Ball
Direct Known Subclasses:
RubberBall
public abstract class Ball
extends java.lang.Object
this class is to make the ball in the game

  • Constructor Details

    • Ball

      public Ball​(java.awt.geom.Point2D center, int radiusA, int radiusB, java.awt.Color inner, java.awt.Color border)
      this is to initialise the variables
      Parameters:
      center - is the center point of the ball
      radiusA - is the diameter of the ball from the most left of the ball to the most right of the ball
      radiusB - is the diameter of the ball from the top of the ball to the bottom of the ball
      inner - is the color of the ball
      border - is the border outline of the ball

  • Method Details

    • makeBall

      protected abstract java.awt.Shape makeBall​(java.awt.geom.Point2D center, int radiusA, int radiusB)
      this is where makeBall takes in the value of center, radiusA, and radiusB to make the shape of the ball
      Parameters:
      center - taking the points from the constructor
      radiusA - taking the diameter of the ball from the constructor
      radiusB - taking the diameter of the ball from the constructor
      Returns:
      this returns the shape of the ball with the diameter radiusA, radiusB starting from the center parameter

    • move

      public void move()
      It's moving the ball

    • moveTo

      public void moveTo​(java.awt.Point p)
      this is to set the ball back to its original position
      Parameters:
      p - the point at which the ball is supposed to be before it starts moving

    • setSpeed

      public void setSpeed​(int x, int y)
      set the speed of the ball
      Parameters:
      x - set the speed at which the ball is going on the x axis
      y - set the speed at which the ball is going on the y axis
